body_html:
Hi @soumith , thanks for your response.

I found the reason of the error I said above, but I do not know how to handle it.

I used release v0.2.0 code for installing, if I use master branch and remove the nccl file I said above, I install pytorch successfully.
But I want to use v0.2.0 for compatibility purpose, is there some way to solve this preblem? I found that pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/third-party/nccl is empty in v0.2.0 code

body:
Hi @soumith , thanks for your response.

I found the reason of the error I said above, but I do not know how to handle it.

I used release v0.2.0 code for installing, if I use master branch and remove the nccl file I said above, I install pytorch successfully.
But I want to use v0.2.0 for compatibility purpose, is there some way to solve this preblem? I found that pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/third-party/nccl is empty in v0.2.0 code
